title: Lou's tasty white loaf made in a breadmaker
ingredients: ['250ml warm water (not hot but a bit hotter than lukewarm)', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried milk powder', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1/2 tablespoon honey', '450g plain white flour', '1 1/4 teaspoon easy bake yeast']
